content: each of these little puffy **hearts** can be finished in about 30 minutes give or take and make super projects for using up odds and ends of your yarn stash designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz the hearts are knitted in acrylic dk yarns on single pointed needles not in the round each is knitted in stockinette stitch in one piece stuffed and seamed up the back to make a puffy heart shape since its launch this pattern has been used to support many charitable causes and sharing this pattern to raise funds for charities is encouraged to spread love and kindness however reselling this free pattern is not permitted choose from the english pattern dutch translation or for knitters with visual impairments choose the hearts accessible pattern which is written with screen reader accessibility in mind i am still learning how to make my patterns accessible for people with visual impairments so any feedback to improve this version is welcomed **needles** a pair of 3 75mm straight single pointed knitting needles us 5 **recommended yarn** acrylic dk yarns double knitting/light worsted weight a few grammes per heart **notions** tapestry needle stitch holder and a small handful of toy filling or cotton wool balls to stuff **sizes** one size only - 6 5cm high x 6 5cm wide **techniques** for confident beginners and above other techniques used include casting on and off knits purls make 1 increase decreases and a little seaming to finish **pattern info** patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2016 amanda berry all rights reserved
